thread.title: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 12, 2015)
thread.title_full: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 12, 2015)

title: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 12, 2015)
text:
September 10, 2015 Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 12, 2015) A roundup of the most interesting stories from other sites, collected by the staff at MIT Technology Review . 
MIT Technology Review contributor James Surowiecki reviews the explanatory literature about inequality in the New York Review of Books. Editor David Rotman wrote about technology’s contributions to inequality here , here , and here . — Jason Pontin , editor in chief and publisher
